newsitem.title: USA: Sepracor sells ChiRex stock for $31.1 mln.
newsitem.headline: Sepracor sells ChiRex stock for $31.1 mln.

text.p: Sepracor Inc said Tuesday that it has netted about $31.1 million from a public offering of 3,489,301 shares of common stock of ChiRex Inc.
The shares were priced at $9.50 each. The offering, said the company, includes all the ChiRex shares held by Sepracor.
The company said that its supply agreement with ChiRex for the production of large scale cGMP bulk active intermediates will not be affected by this stock offering.
Sepracor develops enhanced versions of existing, widely-sold drugs.
